steps: 1. Validate all polls have required fields: title, question, options (min 2, max 10)
2. For each poll, generate unique _id for the poll and each option
3. Set createdBy to the admin user ID
4. Populate createdByUser with admin user details
5. Calculate isActive based on expiresAt vs current date
6. Initialize votesCount and percentage to 0 for new polls (unless provided)
7. Set totalVotes to 0 for new polls (sum of all option votesCount)
8. Set createdAt to current date if not provided
9. Ensure options array has proper structure with _id, text, votesCount, percentage
10. Validate dates are in ISO 8601 format

validationRules.title: Required, string, min 5 characters, max 200 characters
validationRules.question: Required, should match title (for backward compatibility)
validationRules.options: Required array, min 2 options, max 10 options. Each option must have text field.
validationRules.expiresAt: Optional, must be future date if provided (for active polls)
validationRules.isActive: Calculated: expiresAt > current date (or expiresAt is null)

backendFieldsToPopulate: _id - Generate unique ObjectId for each poll
options[]._id - Generate unique ObjectId for each option
createdBy - Set to admin user ID
createdByUser - Populate from admin user document
createdAt - Set to current date if not provided
isActive - Calculate from expiresAt vs current date
totalVotes - Calculate from sum of option votesCount
